text: Sergei Makarovich Kramarenko (; 10 April 1923 – 21 May 2021) was a Soviet Air Force officer. He fought in World War II and the Korean War. He was honored withHero of the Soviet Union. He retired in 1977 with the rank of major- general. He was the last living Soviet flying ace of Korean War. Kramarenko died on 22 May 2020, aged 97.Ушёл из жизни Герой Советского Союза, ветеран Великой Отечественной и Корейской войн Сергей Макарович Крамаренко ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II
title: Sergey Kramarenko (pilot)
